column3: was without a doubt the baby back ribs! They are what I've been looking for my whole BBQ life. The blackened crust was devine
column4: the meat was not quite fall off the bone
column8: a lil spicy- everything ribs should be
column9: and what you expect them to taste like when you find yourself watching a BBQ cook-off on the Food Network for one too many hours on a sad Thursday night.
